text: Shane Charles (born 30 August 1983) is a Grenadian retired athlete who specialized in the 400 metres hurdles. In 2001 he set the junior national record with a time of 53.89. On 14 May 2006 he made a time of 49.51 in the 400 m hurdles, the senior national record in this event.
